text: The Patients Association is an independent charity based in London. It aims to improve patients' experience of healthcare. It started in 1963, and became a registered charity in 1991. Rachel Power is the Chief Executive. It runs a national helpline which helps people find their way around the often complex world of health and social care. It runs focus groups and surveys for patients. == References == Category:Medical and health organisations in the United Kingdom
title: Patients Association
